#Text=2005 Afghan opium harvest begins
#Text=Tuesday , May 3 , 2005
#Text=Opium poppy .
#Text=Photo by Catherine Giayvia
#Text=Most heroin sold in Europe comes from Afghanistan 's poppies .
#Text=This past week , the 2005 opium harvest was in full view and going full speed in Afghanistan .
#Text=The cultivators gathering resin from the crop are operating even near the main road through Kandahar and the farmers are out gathering resin from opium poppies in full view .
#Text=Last year 80 % of the world 's opium came from Afghanistan and production is up over 239 % since 2003 , according to U.S. government estimates .
#Text=Afghanistan is the world 's largest producer of illegal drugs .
#Text=In 2002
#Text=Super Bowl ads , the White House sent out the message that " drugs fund terrorists " .

#Text=

_	_	_	_

#Text= The Bush administration has decided not to destroy the opium crop in Afghanistan , " stated a U.S. intelligence official returning from Afghanistan in relation to the 60 % smaller 2002 crop .

column1: #Text=The source , who requested that he not be identified , noted " U.S. forces could destroy the crops using aerial spraying techniques , but no such actions are planned .

column3:
_	_	_	_

#Text=U.S. plans to spray the crops were canceled at the request of Afghan President Hamid Karzai , who has called for jihad or  holy war " , but is concerned that aerial spraying could be harmful to the health of Afghan villagers .

column1: #Text=The U.S. claims that the spraying would be safe , but is granting Karzai 's request .
#Text=Karzai has indicated that he may change his mind if other U.S. strategies fail to halt the opium .
#Text=Congress budgeted $ 774 million for anti-drug operations in Afghanistan just this year .
#Text=Estimating the value of the crop
#Text=The CIA reports in From Flowers to Heroin that it takes 10kg of opium to make 1kg of 90 % pure heroin .
#Text=The CIA states that impurities are introduced into the processed heroin before it hits the street , making the purity of the end consumer product about 40 % .
#Text=That implies that 10kg of opium makes about 2.25kg of 40 % pure heroin .
#Text=The Guardian reports that the 2002 opium harvest was 3400 metric tons .
#Text=Using the conversion supplied by the CIA , 2002 's 3400 opium harvest could be converted into 765 metric tons of heroin .
#Text=According to the International Narcotics Control Board , the 2003 opium harvest was 3600 metric tons .
#Text=Using the estimated 239 % increase of the present harvast over 2003 , it means that the 2005 harvest is about 8600 metric tons .
#Text=The 2002 street price of heroin in the UK was about 60 £ per GRAM , or ( assuming the present 1.89 USD to 1 £ exchange ) 113.40 USD per GRAM .
#Text=As the supply goes up the price will come down some , so for this calculation only the 2002 figures will be used .

#Text=If all the opium harvest is converted into heroin and all of it is sold at the UK street price , the total street value of the harvest is 86.7 billion USD . ( 765 metric tons x 1000kg/metric ton x 1000 grams/kg x 113.4 USD/gram = about 86.7 billion USD . )
#Text=To the extent the 2002 numbers are valid today , the street value of the 2005 harvest should be roughly twice the street value of the 2002 harvest , about 173 billion USD .
#Text=To put these numbers in perspective , the total market capitalization of Ford , General Motors and Daimler Chrysler combined is about 76 billion USD .
#Text=The total market capitalization of Toyota and Honda combined is about 167 billion USD .
#Text=No Statement by the Financial Action Task Force
#Text=The Financial Action Task Force ( FATF ) was formed to promote harmonization of international antimoney laundering ( AML ) laws .
#Text=Despite the fact that tens of billions of USDs are generated from the Afgan opium harvest alone , the FATF has not added Afghanistan to its blacklist of uncooperative nations .
#Text=One has to wonder , therefore , what the poppy farmers are doing with their share of the money that escapes the notice of the banking system and the FATF .
#Text=Estimating the value of the crop
#Text=CIA .
#Text=" From Flowers to Heroin " — CIA , April 25 , 2005
#Text=Alan Travis .
#Text=" UK heroin fight hit by record opium harvest " — Guardian UK , October 26 , 2002
#Text=UN . " Summary on International Narcotics Control Board ( INCB ) Press Briefing : Drug Control in Afghanistan " — INCB , 2004
